item.title: What’s It Like to Deal With Brutal U.S. Tariffs? Ask Malaysia.
item.description: Once a cog in the Malaysian economy, the solar industry profited from Chinese investment. Now it’s becoming a case study of what happens when the Unit...

item.title: Tesla Grants Musk $29 Billion in Stock to ‘Keep Elon’s Energies Focused’
item.description: The “interim” package announced on Monday was intended to help retain Elon Musk, whose previous pay plan was invalidated by a judge.

item.title: More than 140 African Migrants Feared Dead In Boat Disaster Near Yemen
item.description: The vessel capsized along a heavily traveled but treacherous route for Africans transiting the war-torn country to find work in the rich Gulf states.

item.title: Trump’s Immigrant Crackdown in New York: More Arrests, Longer Detention
item.description: More than half of the immigrants arrested in the New York City area since Jan. 20 do not have criminal convictions or charges, new data shows.

item.title: You Are Contaminated
item.description: The toxic byproducts of human civilization are everywhere. Even in our bodies.
